ygData.subject: Re: Bard hate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Union ... Actually, a friend of mine noticed this too. He (a level 30 Paladin) was attacked by some wondering cent, and the OTHER cents in the area (the
ygData.messageBody:
>In past 2 weeks - I been attacked 3 time by Cents - and I was doing nothing
>but Selos - one time nothing at all! (ok I was chatting but shoulda been
>playing something - cuz a bard should always be singing something Bard
Union
>rule 101.)


Actually, a friend of mine noticed this too. He (a level 30 Paladin) was
attacked by some wondering cent, and the OTHER cents in the area (the named
one, and another) came to assist MY FRIEND! Sadly, my friend died before the
nice cents killed the crazy one.

So it seems there are from wild, renegade cents roaming through the Karanas.
A bug? A quest?

Daleia d'Allaney
Bard of the 10th Song, Bristlebane
